item.title: d3 charts - wrapping 'NVD3 Charts' in a web component
item.author: patrick@rwx.io (Patrick Goddi)
item.description: In my continued experiments with Polymer, I created a web component that wraps NVD3 - a reusable chart library for d3.js. As part of the activity I ported all of the NVD3 example charts to a web component I am calling <goddip-charts>. The component is contained in a pogg on poggr, as this is where I do my experimenting and it allows me to code and serve the project documents in the one place.
